dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4256441D] www.sports08.com selling counterfeit LACOSTE merchandise
dmca.body:
-----Original Message----- From: Mia Kelley [mailto:MKelley@lacoste-usa.com] Sent: Monday, June 04, 2007 2:21 PM To: DMCA Subject: RE: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4256441D] www.sports08.com selling counterfeit LACOSTE merchandise To Whom It May Concern: Please see the attached letter. If you are still unable to see the attachment, this letter was also sent via UPS. Please let me know if you do not receive it. Best Regards, Mia Kelley -----Original Message----- From: DMCA [mailto:dmca@theplanet.com] Sent: Wednesday, May 30, 2007 1:20 PM To: Mia Kelley Subject: FW: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4256441D] www.sports08.com selling counterfeit LACOSTE merchandise Please re-send the below-pasted e-mail since there is no attachment. Sorry for the inconvenience. Legal Response Team -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Sunday, May 27, 2007 10:46 PM To: DMCA Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4256441D] www.sports08.com selling counterfeit LACOSTE merchandise ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. www.sports08.com selling counterfeit LACOSTE merchandise Added by system at Thursday, May 24 2007 04:18 pm X-MailFrom: MKelley@lacoste-usa.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Thu May 24 16:17:27 2007 Received: (qmail 9026 invoked by alias); 24 May 2007 21:17:26 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 8398 invoked from network); 24 May 2007 21:16:17 -0000 Received: from spooling.theplanet.com (69.56.141.4) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP;
